name: Robin Mills
what_you_do: As a professionally trained and qualified executive and business coach, I specialise in supporting professionals, leaders, entrepreneurs and business owners to confidently achieve their goals, reach their highest potential and thrive professionally and personally in the process.
who_you_serve: I work with talented individuals and organisations, to help my clients transform their clarity, confidence and mindset to grow, overcome challenges, achieve real results and have greater impact.
signature_programs: Executive coaching, Business coaching, Career coaching, Work-life balance coaching, Confidence coaching, Mindset transformation coaching, Speaker confidence coaching, Resiliency coaching, Stress and overwhelm management coaching
business_focus: Helping clients transform their clarity, confidence and mindset to grow, overcome challenges, achieve real results and have greater impact.
service_provided: Executive coaching, Business coaching, Career coaching, Work-life balance coaching, Confidence coaching, Mindset transformation coaching, Speaker confidence coaching, Resiliency coaching, Stress and overwhelm management coaching
